s7.name: Siemens
s7.description: Allows connection to Siemens devices, such as SIEMENS SINUMERIK or SIEMENS S7

mtconnect.name: MTConnect
mtconnect.description: Provides MTConnect interface for other applications

opcua.name: OPCUA
opcua.description: Provides OPCUA interface for other applications

datahub.name: CELOS Xchange
datahub.description: Provides CELOS Xchange interface for other applications

Descriptions.ReadMore: More information can be found in the documentation
Descriptions.Step1: With the help of the templates, you can load a suitable pre-configuration into the device. Later, you still have the option of making changes to the configuration. Please first accept the terms and conditions in order to continue.
Descriptions.Step2: Here you can select the appropriate template.
Descriptions.Step3: Select or deselect the desired data sources here. Selected data sources are started automatically after successful completion of the setup. This setting can be changed later.
Descriptions.Step4: Select the desired application interfaces that are to be provided and activated by the system. This setting can be changed later.

name.10diIoShieldMessenger: Input board to DMG MORI Messenger

description.empty: Template does not include any data source, virtual data points, mappings and application interface

description.ncMessenger: SIEMENS SINUMERIK 840D sl to DMG MORI Messenger
